segments.text: I'm watching the water continue to flow from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely full, and it's just overflowing in a smooth, constant sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a large puddle on the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running down the cabinet doors, saturating the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to cause some significant damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the wood swelling and warping over time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too, just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness to this mess is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the cold water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel a bit frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water must be quite loud, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR
